author: A_Brickset_user
title: Swell! Just Swell!
review: Charming little set. I especally like the Iceburg... Iceberg... However ya spell it. I'm currently lookin' for all the bricks for this. And Instructions... I know i have em... Oh, well. The arctic theme rocked! Re Release these, TLC!!! Please!!!!!!

author: mrmitch
title: The Artic is Cool !!
review: When we began collecting LEGO's the Artic theme had just come out. This set was one of our first in our ever growing collection. The sled is fun, like the color and the attention to detail. The trailer is really cool, you lift off the top to find tools you need on your artic mission. The iceberg is OK, the real bonus is the extra explorer. If you have this set and 6520 Mobile Outpost you can really have a good set up for playablility. The Artic theme is great, I think its about time for something simular to come out again.
